mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_real_name_authentication_of_member (user_id, real_name, id_number, certificates_positive, certificates_negative) VALUES (#{userId}, #{realName}, #{idNumber}, #{certificatesPositive}, #{certificatesNegative})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_real_name_authentication_of_member SET real_name = #{realName}, id_number = #{id_number}, certificates_positive = #{certificatesPositive}, certificates_negative = #{certificatesNegative}, `status` = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_real_name_authentication_of_member ORDER BY apply_time DESC
SELECT * FROM t_real_name_authentication_of_member WHERE status = 0 ORDER BY apply_time DESC
SELECT * FROM t_real_name_authentication_of_member WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY apply_time DESC
SELECT * FROM t_real_name_authentication_of_member WHERE status = 2 ORDER BY apply_time DESC
SELECT * FROM t_real_name_authentication_of_member WHERE user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
